title: Why Umbrex?
content:
Founded by McKinsey alums, Umbrex provides rapid access to independent management consultants with experience at top-tier consulting firms. 

Over 90% of Umbrex consultants are alums of McKinsey, Bain, or BCG. 

The majority also have experience in industry roles. Why should you consider working with Umbrex?
bullet_points: You need the caliber of consulting talent that you would find at the highest-ranked global firms - without all the overhead.
You want a flexible solution tailored to your needs
You need someone to start ASAP.
You don’t want to spend time sorting through 40 resumes.
